alternateName: New Fist of the North Star
description: In the 21st century, a nuclear war turned most of the Earth's surface into a desert wasteland, which also resulted in the contamination of the Earth's water supply. A man named Sanga has built the fortified haven of the "Last Land...
keywords: anger,punch the attack,scream,supernatural power,fast motion scene
name: Shin Hokuto no Ken

review.name: The third chapter that should have never been made
review.reviewBody: I'm a huge fan of Hokuto no Ken series since the early 80s and I was very disappointed when I saw this "Shin hokuto no ken". Everything seems made to be a mere marketing operation. The 3D scenes don't always match correctly with 2D, the animation is not so good, the plot is a bit boring and the new voice of Kenshiro is much worse than the original one by Akira Kamiya. And, the last but not the least, what's that horrible part of a samurai armor in Kenshiro's right shoulder? That's crap I say!

trailer.description: Home Video Trailer from ADV Films
trailer.name: Fist of the Northstar
